Package ngoy.core

Core.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AppRoot
    Sub components can inject this interface to gain access to the root app component.
    Injector
    Returns an instance of a given class, having all the instance's dependencies injected.
    LocaleProvider
    Provides the current locale.
    OnCompile
    Compile lifecycle hook.
    OnDestroy
    Descruction lifecycle hook.
    OnInit
    Initialization lifecycle hook.
    PipeTransform
    Transforms an input value to an output value.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Context<T>
    The context or 'model' associated with a simple template.
    Events
    experimental.
    LocaleProvider.Default  
    ModuleWithProviders<T>
    A dynamically configured module.
    ModuleWithProviders.Builder<T>  
    Provider
    Describes what to inject when an instance of a given class is requested by the injector.
    Util
    Utils.
    Variable<T>  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NgoyException
    Exception thrown from within ngoy.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Component
    A component is 'logic' for HTML/XML elements.
    Directive
    Also known as a component without a template.
    HostBinding
    Bind an expression to an attribute, class, style or text on the component/directive's host element.
    Inject
    An annotated field's value or setter method will be injected right after the component/class was instantiated but before OnInit will be called.
    Injectable
    An annotated class's will be included as a provider/service when scanning the class path.
    Input
    An input parameter of a component.
    NgModule
    Organize declarations/providers and other modules together to be imported as a whole.
    Nullable
    An annotated parameter or method (return type) may have the null value.
    Optional
    If a service/provider for an Inject annotated field, setter or constructor parameter is not available, do nothing instead of throwing a 'provider not found' exception.
    Pipe
    Annotated classes can be used as a pipe inside an expression.
    Provide
    Inject another class at 'declaration time'.

Package ngoy.core Description

Core.
